passage.title: Who is lazy?
passage.paragraph: Sam is a lazy boy. One day, his mother says to him, "Sam, look at your sheet! It's too dirty. Would you like to wash it now?"
Sam looks at the sheet and then thinks for a while and says, "I don't think it's necessary. I can turn the sheet over. Is that all right?"
Sam's mother is very angry at this. "How lazy you are!" she shouts. "I turned it over last week!"
